skins.shipDescription: Special Type I-class destroyer number 10 每 Uranami.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the Type I... No wait, Type II... Last try: middle-of-the-pack destroyer, Uranami. My friends and I in Destroyer Division 19 worked really hard. Okay, serious question: what Type am I, exactly?
skins.acquisition: What am I doing here? ...Hmmm? You're adopting me? Aaaaall righty. You lead-a-dee, I'll follow-a-loo.
skins.login: Could you give me the go-ahead to play now?
skins.details: Whenever I ask Kinu if I can borrow her cute mask... she just tells me no way in heck...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Uranami rhymes with rural mommy. Doodle-loo, nothing better to dooo.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Help friends in need, defeat enemies with speed. That's my little motto.
skins.secretaryIdle3: When I tell folks about the things I like, they all look super weirded out, then they strangerzone me. But oh well.

skins.shipDescription: It's snowing...! I've finished rallying the forces... so let us advance!
skins.acquisition: It's snowing...! I've finished rallying the forces... so let us advance!
skins.login: The best thing about winter... is skiing in the snow!
skins.details: Commander, come ski with me... Yeah, bring the Manjuus too...!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Today, I will transform into a snow bunny!
skins.secretaryIdle2: The snow is so sparkly and soft... it's very fun.
skins.secretaryIdle3: You shouldn't underestimate me~ I've been practicing this whole time.
skins.secretaryTouch: Eep?! Commander, your hands are cold...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: My outfit is thick, therefore wholesome...
